conclusion: The task is to determine which container (D, E, or F) the liquid from A, B, and C will flow into after passing through the baffles.
The image shows three streams labeled A, B, and C at the top, flowing downward. There are slanted barriers (black, purple, and teal) and three containers labeled D, E, and F at the bottom.
Stream A is positioned above the black slanted barrier, stream B is above the purple slanted barrier, and stream C is above the teal slanted barrier.

The black slanted barrier is angled to deflect liquid to the left. The purple slanted barrier is angled to deflect liquid to the left. The teal slanted barrier is angled to deflect liquid to the right.

premise: Stream A is positioned above the black slanted barrier, and the black slanted barrier deflects liquid to the left.
conclusion: Stream A will strike the black slanted barrier and be deflected to the left.

premise: Stream A is deflected to the left by the black slanted barrier, and the path aligns with container D.
conclusion: Stream A will flow into container D.

premise: Stream B is positioned above the purple slanted barrier, and the purple slanted barrier deflects liquid to the left.
conclusion: Stream B will strike the purple slanted barrier and be deflected to the left.

premise: Stream B is deflected to the left by the purple slanted barrier, and the path aligns with container E.
conclusion: Stream B will flow into container E.

premise: Stream C is positioned above the teal slanted barrier, and the teal slanted barrier deflects liquid to the right.
conclusion: Stream C will strike the teal slanted barrier and be deflected to the right.

premise: Stream C is deflected to the right by the teal slanted barrier, and the path aligns with container F.
conclusion: Stream C will flow into container F.

premise: Stream A flows into container D, stream B flows into container E, and stream C flows into container F.
conclusion: Liquid from A flows into container D; liquid from B flows into container E; liquid from C flows into container F.
